task.title: Editing Project Homepage
task.shortdesc: If you would like to make changes to the project homepage, you can edit it from the project dashboard. This includes changing the project theme.

step.cmd: Click on the Edit project homepage option located in the Utilities column.
Fill out the Edit project homepage form.

info.p: This form lets you edit everything about your project homepage. Including changing the content, the theme (this is a limited Drupal feature), the sidebar information, etc.

step.cmd: Optional: You can preview the the changes youâ€™ve made by clicking on View changes.

info.p: Additionally, you can delete the project homepage by clicking on the Delete button.
